name: Amo-yo: Illustration Hand-Knitting Support Application
description: Amo-yo is an application that supports hand-knitting illustrations. It allows users to create original knitting patterns and displays the number of stitches until the color changes, thereby reducing knitting mistakes. This makes it enjoyable and easy to create unique works, so much so that users may lose track of time while knitting.
